request.description:
## Details: 1. Handshake must be called before sign-in and sign-up (Mobile/web App) APIs 2. Handshake has expiry of 5 minutes i.e. if user does not sign-up/sign-up in 5 min, it will expire and sign-up/in will fail. Front-end shall call handshake again to sign-up/in. 3. Upon handshake expiry, an http status code 503 is received. In such case, call client-handshake API. | **Parameters** | **Notes** | | --- | --- | | `agent_iam (string) (mandatory)` | Enum:
\- if user is logging in from mobile app then
`agent_iam = "mobile-app"`
\- if user is logging in from web then:
`agent_iam = "web-app"` |

## Details:

- Upon successful sign in, a **1 day session** is maintained for the user.
- After 24 hours, session will get expired and a response with http status code 503 will be received on the APIs that are called after sign-in.
- Upon http status code 503, call client-handshake API again, then sign-in API for a new user session.
    

| **Paramters** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `email (string) (mandatory)` | `valid email of the user` |
| `password (string) (mandatory)` | `password for user account` |

> IMPORTANT: This API requires token (in Authorization header) that is received in client-handshake API

exec: console.log("Collection Variable is_listWorkspaces_called is set to 1");

request.description:
## Details:

- Doesn't require request body.
- Shall be called right after user successfully logs into the mobile/web app.
- This API fetches user workspaces (if any).
- If received empty array, then show a "create workspace" button on the front-end.
- Upon http status code 503, call mobile/web app handshake again and then sign in user.
    

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) received in the response on sign-in API or Email OTP verification API

response.name: Success

exec: console.log("Collection Variable is_listWorkspaces_called is set to 1");
// Check if the property exists in the first element of the array
console.log("The property 'p_kuid' does not exist in the first element of 'workspace_projects' array.");
console.log("The 'workspace_projects' array is either empty or does not exist.");

request.description:
## Details:

- This API fetches user owned workspace projects' list.
- If received empty array, it means user doesn't have any projects in the specific workspace.
- Upon http status code 503, call mobile/web app handshake again and then sign in user.
    

| **Parameters** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `workspace_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `kuid of the workspace whose projects are being listed. (kuid is received in user-workspaces API's response)` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

request.description:
## Details:

- This API is used tosearch bugs.
- Upon http status code 403, show a relevant message i.e. user does not have permission to create project in a specific workspace.
- Upon http status code 503, call mobile/web app handshake again and then sign in user.
- NOTE: Make sure, among parameters: search_query, tags, assignees, status, at least 1 parameter must not be empty.
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `workspace_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `workspace kuid in which the logged in user is creating project` |
| `project_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `title of the project` |
| `search_query (string) (mandatory)` | `the text to be searched in bugs' title or description (can be sent empty)` |
| `tags (array) (mandatory)` | `array of tags ids (can be sent empty array)` |
| `assignees (array) (mandatory)` | `array of assignees' ids (can be sent empty array)` |
| `status (string) (mandatory)` | `resolution status of the bug i.e to_do, in-progress, done` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

request.description:
## Details:

- This API is used to fetch Bug filters.
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `workspace_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `kuid of the workspace` |
| `project_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `kuid of the project` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

## Details:

- This API is used to apply bugs filters.
- NOTE: Make sure, among parameters: label, operating_system, version, reporter, assignees, status, at least 1 parameter must not be empty.
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `workspace_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `workspace kuid in which the logged in user is searching bug` |
| `project_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `kuid of the project` |
| `label (string) (optional)` | `the text to be searched in bugs' title (can be sent empty)` |
| `version (array) (optiona)` | `version of the bug (can be sent empty array)` |
| `assignees (array) (optional)` | `array of assignees' ids (can be sent empty array)` |
| `status (array) (optional)` | `resolution status of the bug i.e to_do, in-progress, done` |
| `operating_system (string) (optional)` | `os of device (can be sent empty array)` |
| `date (string) (optional)` | `date of the bug (can be sent empty array)` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.

## Details:

- This API is used delete the bug.
- Upon http status code 400, show a relevant message i.e. bug not found
    

| **Parametes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- |
| `workspace_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `workspace kuid in which the logged in user is deleting bug` |
| `bug_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `kuid of the bug` |
| `project_kuid (string) (mandatory)` | `kuid of the project` |

> IMPORTANT: Requires token (in Authorization header) which is received in the response of sign-in API or Email OTP verification API.
